name: pff_player_seasonlogs with career_year parameter
description: Test case for PFF player seasonlogs columns filtered by career_year range
expected_query: select "player"."pid", player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos" AS "pos_0", "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."receiving" AS "pff_receiving_0", "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."offense" AS "pff_offense_0", "player"."pos" from "player" left join "pff_player_seasonlogs" as "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895" on "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."pid" = "player"."pid" and "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."year" = 2023 inner join "player_seasonlogs" as "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895_career_year" on "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895_career_year"."pid" = "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."pid" and "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895_career_year"."year" = "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."year" and "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895_career_year"."seas_type" = 'REG' where "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895_career_year"."career_year" between 1 and 3 group by player.fname, player.lname, "player"."pos", "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."receiving", "t3ccee899b242f76b0cc3232311933895"."offense", "player"."pid", "player"."lname", "player"."fname", "player"."pos" order by 5 DESC NULLS LAST, "player"."pid" asc limit 500
